website_summaries.verdict: A good budget option for anyone who wants a simple, classic look inside their kitchen.
pros: Sink surface features a hammered look in the copper for a rustic look
More durable than some more common sinks
Easy to install with the proper setup
cons: Using a copper cleaner to maintain the surface will leave small spots on the surface

customer_reviews.title: A lot of problem...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this end of apr 2017... This is so bad... Color fade already... What I can fix this one?
customer_reviews.author: minjung

customer_reviews.title: I chose wisely. I love my sink. Perfect size for us.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my sink installed for over a year I’m obsessed with it I love it. The front and sides have kept the same patina. Sometimes certain things cause spots on the bottom but it doesn’t bother me if it would bother you this is not the sink for you .
customer_reviews.author: driftergal

customer_reviews.title: World class craftsmanship, luxurious look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look and finish, this adds a high end look and feel to our kitchen update. We did not remodel our kitchen just updated our current kitchen to bring it into this millennium. This sink fit well with our current kitchen sink cabinets. Refinished surfaces, new wood counters, backslash and fresh paint is all we did. Friends can't believe it's the same kitchen. And it all started with picking this sink!
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: 22" not 20"
customer_reviews.text: Measure before you construct/prepare a cabinet! The one I received isn't "30 x 20 x 8 inches" as listed in the "Product information Technical Details" section; it's 22" from back to the front, and a 2" difference is excessive. There's also a very small difference in the length, but it's a variation expected for handmade. This particular sink may take up too much extra space and possibly require a cabinet modification. It has a couple of tiny flaws anyway. Otherwise, it looks amazing, like a nice piece of art. It's heavy and beautifully shaped.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and so spacious/comfortable to use
customer_reviews.text: This is GORGEOUS! Easy to install and so spacious/comfortable to use. Tons of compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: ... have had this for a few months its been great. it changes patina with day
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a few months its been great. it changes patina with day, which I expected and find attractive. Highly recommend, at this price. I did add some spray foam insulation to quiet it down worked well and easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Carey DeMeza

customer_reviews.title: COOPER FARMHOUSE SINK
customer_reviews.text: Simply put amazing an a eye catcher as you walk into kitchen .BEAUTIFUL as seen on picture . searched high an low an well made
customer_reviews.author: Momster

customer_reviews.title: Love this sink
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! It makes a statement in our renovated kitchen! There is no sink grate to fit so we ordered the one that is slightly wider and had a machine shop cut off and file one section from each end—perfect fit! Just a bit of space to get grate in and out with no scratches against the copper!
customer_reviews.author: D. McGee

customer_reviews.title: Cornerstone of our kitchen remodel
customer_reviews.text: We have had the sink for a year now and we love it! Great price, great investment. The color changes based on interactions. One of the best Choices we made for our kitchen remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot. But it does change colors and if you use copper cleaner then it is spotted. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous copper farm sink. Can’t wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: Lovely craftsmanship. Have not installed yet. Just waiting for countertops.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hanby

customer_reviews.title: Open your box. Check that you've received the right product. The seller didnt.
customer_reviews.text: Shipped a much smaller sink, for a bathroom instead of a kitchen. Now outside of the return window. Absolute crap.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Beaulac

customer_reviews.title: This copper sink has become my favorite kitchen sink for our Tiny Homes
customer_reviews.text: This copper sink has become my favorite kitchen sink for our Tiny Homes. Great price for this sink from Sinkology. I recommend it to anyone looking for a copper sink. You can see how it looks on our Youtube channel, under Alpine Tiny Homes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Ahhhhmazing. (Cosmetic review)
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this sink! It just arrived this morning, and it is even more beautiful than I imagined. Can't wait until our kitchen remodel is finished so I can try it out. It will be such a gorgeous focal point of the kitchen. I will update after it is installed!
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my sink! Very durable and looks amazing. Have had many compliments : )
customer_reviews.author: awesome game!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink!! This is one of the first thing people notice when they walk into the kitchen!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Victor

customer_reviews.title: the sink is beautiful! The pictures don't do it justice
customer_reviews.text: While we haven't installed this yet in our kitchen, the sink is beautiful! The pictures don't do it justice. This will be the focal point of our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER DANLEY

customer_reviews.title: Beauu
customer_reviews.text: Not installed yet but it is beautiful can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Donita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's not in yet. But looks just great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina L.

product_meta.title: Sinkology SK302-30AC Courbet Farmhouse Apron Front Handmade Single Bowl Kitchen Sink, 30", Hammered Antique Copper
product_meta.description: The courbet 30 inch Copper apron front Farmhouse kitchen sink makes a statement in any kitchen design. Making a Farmhouse Copper sink the focal point of your kitchen creates an immediate impact. Copper sinks by Sinkology are handcrafted from pure 16 gauge solid Copper and protected by a lifetime warranty. With hassle free installation and effortless care, a Copper sink from Sinkology is designed to fit your lifestyle and be a focal point of pride for your home. Design with the sink in mind.
feature_bullets: Take pride in your kitchen sink, choose one that will stand out beautifully. 75 inches braided nylon hose
Hand hammered and hand finished in durable and luxurious Antique Copper
Handcrafted from druable and pure 16 gauge solid Copper
Sinkology Copper sinks will not turn Green with typical indoor use
Maintenance free, protect occasionally with Copper armor wax, SK302-30AC # sarmor-101
